function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Confusion and uncertainty about dealing with the pandemic on construction jobsites","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread on construction sites","Mitigation":"Implementing clear construction-related guidelines and best practices for pandemic management","Technologies":"Health and safety technology for monitoring and enforcing compliance with guidelines","People":"Construction workers, site managers, and subcontractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Impact of the pandemic on the construction industry","Impact":"Reduction in productivity, delays in project timelines, and increased construction costs","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to ensure worker safety, providing flexibility in project timelines, and managing supply chain disruptions","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and project management software","People":"Construction workers, project managers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, supply chain management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of definite construction-related guidelines and best practices for pandemic management","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread on construction sites, and confusion among construction practitioners","Mitigation":"Developing and disseminating industry-wide recommended practices for pandemic management in construction","Technologies":"Online training platforms for construction practitioners, communication tools for sharing best practices","People":"Construction workers, site managers, and subcontractors","Owner":"Industry associations, government agencies, construction companies"}]}
